meanings.definition: A motor vehicle designed for carrying goods or passengers on a commercial basis.
meanings.sent1: The motortrucks delivered packages to the store.
meanings.sent2: The company used motortrucks to transport furniture.
meanings.sent3: The motortrucks had a race to see who could deliver the most packages.
meanings.sent4: The motortrucks roared down the highway like metal beasts.
meanings.sent5: The shiny red motortrucks stood out in the parking lot.

meanings.sent1: They motortrucks the goods to the warehouse.
meanings.sent2: We will motortrucks the equipment to the construction site.
meanings.sent3: He motortrucks the groceries home in his truck.
meanings.sent4: She motortrucks her friends to the party in her pickup truck.
meanings.sent5: The company will motortrucks the supplies to the remote location.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to motor trucks.
meanings.sent1: The motortrucks industry is growing rapidly.
meanings.sent2: She works in the motortrucks manufacturing sector.
meanings.sent3: His motortrucks knowledge helped him fix the engine.
meanings.sent4: The motortrucks design competition showcased innovative ideas.
meanings.sent5: The motortrucks company introduced a new line of vehicles.
